Title: Ruby in the Rough
Description:
<A beautiful ruby set in fine gold sits nestled in a box of draconic origin.

The jewelcrafter in Loamm would love to take a look at this.>
ObjectivesText: Deliver the Shimmering Draconic Gem to Fanilly in Loamm.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find a niffen that likes this item.
